# Modify existing entries in Essential-Model-Documentation

The following links will open pre-filled GitHub issues to modify existing entries in [Essential-Model-Documentation](https://github.com/WCRP-CMIP/Essential-Model-Documentation). 

Expand the relevant category and select the file you are interested in modifying by clicking the hyperlink.

<summary>Del</summary>

*No entries registered yet.*

[➕ Register new Del](https://github.com/WCRP-CMIP/Essential-Model-Documentation/issues/new?template=del.yml)

</details>
